title: KODAK 7XPRO Series 126 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV  (50UHDX7XPRO)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Remote, Wall Mount, Manual, 2 AAA Batteries
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Music, News, Movie, Game, User
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, MPEG1, MPEG2, MPEG2.5, AAC, HEAAC, ASF, WMA
product_specification.Content Providers: Google Play Movies & TV, YouTube, Prime Video
product_specification.Content Languages: Hindi, English, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada, Tamil, Punjabi, Bhojpuri, Marathi, Bengali, Gujarati, Oriya, Sinhala, Urdu, Rajasthani
product_specification.Other Internet Features: More than 5000 Plus Apps and Games, Airplay, Chromecast, Google Play Store with 500,000 Plus TV Shows and Games, Google Assistant
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Network PM44-11BP 100M Ethernet Support (10/100M, DHCP), Browser, Support HDMI-ARC
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant Enabled Remote, HotKeys (Prime Video, YouTube, Sony Liv)
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Google Assistant, Lag Free Performance, Large Memory, Voice Controlled Remote
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product & 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: The Product is Not Used According to Instructions given in the Instruction Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature is Made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Installation or Repair Work is Carried Out by Persons or Agency Other than Authorized by the Company. Site (Premises Where the Product is Kept) Conditions that do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. Original Serial Number is Removed, Obliterated or Altered from the Machine or Cabinet. Defects due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to Service Centre or Purchaser's Residence. The Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag Etc). Dust appearing on television panel after 10 days of usage, mentioned in the Operating Instruction Manual Supplied with this Product or Any Cosmetic Parts
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Brilliant Display: You can enjoy watching your favourite talk shows, soaps, and movies with vivid brightness and amazing contrast on this TV. Offering true colour reproduction, this TV enhances your visual experience as you revel at the beautiful sunsets of the Sahara and the stunning turquoise waters of the Caribbean.
product_description.Android 9.0: This TV runs on the Android 9.0 operating system, which makes a host of exciting features available to you through the competence of artificial intelligence. You can discover and binge-watch a wide variety of interesting content from all around the world with Android TV and stay entertained throughout the day.

review:
It has much brighter colours..i was using samsung smart 4k ultra hd, the picture quality which i had experienced in samsung tv is different than this kodak tv coz my new tv picture quality is little less than my old tv. Kodak tv render the much dynamic colors and no pure clarity.

As android tv rest every thing is good. Google assistant is my favourite thing in it. We can download interesting apps and enjoy.speakers are also fine but if connected with 2.1 bar speakers that would be a treat to our living area and to our ears. Moreover this tv operates in android 9 and is capable of speedy performance and i like its User Interface (UI). The remote which is wireless operates in bluetooth is very cute but limited function for operations.

I rarely give negative review. This is one of those rare times.
Either Kodak is cheating or Flipkart hasn't verified datasheet of the listing.
The TV does not support 60Hz refresh rate for 4K. It only supports 60Hz up to 1080p.
I have a Ugoos AM6 Android TV set top box that is capable of playing 4K movies of size 100 GB. But this cheap TV can't handle the refresh rate.

The OS is unimpressive. There's nothing 'PRO' on this cheap TV

It was good.
1) screen : 5/5
2)sound :4.5/5
3) little hard connectivity
4) money:5/5
5)no perticular warrenty, make sure take good and best warrenty compeny called Jeeves ,even anything won't come full warranty but screen is hart of TV


Don't use & don't go for this TV when you having kids , having sensitive areas like edge of selfs

Don't use liquid and sanitizer for cleaning if you do this warranty won't cover.
Good product for such prize range, hoping to get a Netflix update soon, other than that , it's a really good choice.

The product is exceptionally good for its Price; clean black finish and crisp 4K image. Although there seem to some problem installing apps from the google play store; Eg Netflix. You cant find some of them; may be deliberately BARRED! I had to use a Fire Stick to get Netflix on.

Very nice product in lower rates best Colaty 50" and flipkart also so good job with customers flipkart staff great working teem 100% in to 100%
I bought 6 june now I very happy with Kodak Led Android tv.

Very few people know about Kodak as a TV brand and in this TV brand their specific models. This is the 2nd KODAK TV that I have bought for my parents the series is called 7XPRO. Now even Kodak Customer Care does not know this
This TV has
1. Dual Band Wifi 4G/5G
2. It is super high on RAM 2GB ( which is all that matters )
3. Its internal Hard drive is 8 GB but that does not matter much.
4. It has an awesome Screen Quality.
5. BIG NEGATIVE - NETFLIX does not come by default neither can you download it from Playstore to make it work. However they have used some old Jugaad version of Netflix that does work badly on this TV.
6. Really Loud and Good Quality Speakers.
7. This has Headphone output as well as Digital Output.

In Jan 2020, I bought 55" for 30K from a Spencers Store in Gurgaon - which was the best deal ever. In June I bought 43" for 24000 from Flipkart.

Highly recommend it. Price to Quality ratio the BEST.

Overall tv in this price range is ok. Not to good but not bad.

Pros :-
1. Price -- price is good comparing to other brands.
2. Display -- Display is also good no doubt on it. Brightness and viewing angle is good
3. Sound -- sound quality and loudness is good.


Cons :-
1. Tv stand -- I bought third party tv stand, as company provided stand is not trustable and weak.
2. Performance -- If you open 3-4 apps, tv get hanged and rebooted itself automatically.
3. Netflix not supported -- I don't know why and how this tv does not supports Netflix. Which is a huge negative point of this tv. I also tried to install it manually but this tv did not support Netflix.

Kodak ultra HD 7xpro TV is wonderful TV.
nice picture quality,good product and low price, good sound connectivity, really nice display, delivery man and service engineer is nice persons. Thank you Flipkart 👌

In this prize really good TV awesome picture quality
And main thing is for this picture quality in Samsung and lg lo I need to spend at least 60000 above but I got only this 31000 ,cons no bass for sound and need to improve low voice and I very disappointed thing it is I paid the money for installation no free

As android tv rest every thing is good. Google assistant is my favourite thing in it. We can download interesting apps and enjoy.speakers are also fine but if connected with 2.1 bar speakers that would be a treat to our living area and to our ears. Moreover this tv operates in android 9 and is capable of speedy performance and i like its User Interface (UI). The remote which is wireless operates in bluetooth is very cute but limited function for operations.

The OS is unimpressive. There's nothing 'PRO' on this cheap TV

Pros:
1. Made In India 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 ☺️
2. Excellent Picture Quality. (4.5/5)
3. Easily connect with wifi and Bluetooth Speaker. (5/5)

6. Can play any type of videos by downloading VLC any other applications from store.
7. Extra 500 Supercoins.

Cons:
1. Sound Quality is avg/Poor. I am using external Bluetooth Speaker.
2. When connect the same Bluetooth speaker with wired it start generating extra noise similar type of noise when we touch the cable with hand.
3. Some time I face connectivity issue with Chromecast. (2 -3 times in 10 times).
4. No Netflix 😢😢 (No needed).
5. To get bonus super coin I have complain more than 10 time in which only got 250 coins(In 1 month) and 250 gv after 3 month from the date of purchase.

Love the TV it been a week and yes enjoying the watching it.. Very worth for money.. Thank you flipkart and kodax for beautiful TV and installation in less time.

Good at the price point.
Cons first
A lot of people have mentioned about remote not working and that is truly the case. The remote does get unpaired and stops working. Without an input to the tv, u realy are stuck as the bottom buttons don't have an ok input but only power on and off and volume control so u can't pair a new device or remote without it. Simple workaround - when it arrives, pair ur smartphones with the tv (lot of apps on app store but none from kodak for this like mi and that is sad) so when the remote stops working, just unpair and pair it again using ur smartphones and it starts working again. It is really annoying otherwise. (Happens once a week to ten days with my tv, might be more or less with others)
Sound
Not good not bad. Clarity is good for shows and movies but if u enjoy music, get a soundbar.
Pros
Good display
Android apps
Very cheap for a 43inch uhd ( got it for 19250 during BBD with all card offers clubbed)

It's a good value for money also the most affordable 4k Tv in the price segment. Slim baseles, great picture quality.
Delivery of this tv was on time. Installation is also done professionally. Being a online media consumer the only down side is it doesn't support Netflix.

Really liked the product quality. It's far better than its rivals at this price point. KODAK has done an excellent job in packaging this fabulous product at this price point, an excellent 4K smart tv.
My Kodak led is very nice much better love it

Thank you kodak family.Iit's Very nice sound and best picture quality of this product ..we like it most .but one thing is that the wall mount clip is very poor quality..all most ok ..thank you one's again kodak tv family.

Awesome Product must buy.
Pretty decent service provided by Kotak and FK guy, loved it and recommended to everyone.

No complaints about the picture quality. Could have been better but I think I am fairly satisfied at this price.

Sound is ok but you might want to get a speaker if you are using it in a big hall.

Bluetooth connectivity is poor even at a distance of 6-7 ft.

App support is fine but can't install Netflix.
Very nice pictures quality....Very low cost best quality led tv..Kodak is the best Brand for LED TV

Happy with Kodak TV performance. Picture quality is amazing. Sound is good. Bluetooth Connectivity is fast and remote works good.
If you compare it with other TV's in this range, Kodak comes as a valuable package.
Con:
Does not support Netflix.
HDMI port is on the back side of TV and if you are doing wall mount, uu will have difficulty using it.
Bluetooth range is low and hence, you can't use it if you try to connect your headphone and sit at a distance.
The installation guy was worse, he spoiled my wall using his driller and later blamed the wall for not letting him drill and left. (He did try to sell me some wall mount worth INR 2k before leaving though). I then called a local technician and he was able to install the TV easily without any mess.
The only reason I had to wait for installation for 4 days because Flipkart has this shitty policy that the warranty or return can only be claimed, if the product is installed by their authorised technician
Kodak 7x pro very nice led wajib prize good sound good picture quality good service prize money I am happy thanks Kodak product and Flipkart

such a good Android 4K tv with inbuilt chromecast . delivery and installation also up to the mark. A branded tv like LG/SONY/SAMSUNG , and good to see that it is Made in india. Dont think more. Just go for it
this tv compare to other tvs very good price good product everything works fine quick delivery i am so happy to this purchase
Excellent Product, Working fine with me. With this price, I am got Nice Product no any problem also installation also free. Thank You
The product is reasonably priced and am happy with the features. In the subsequent models I request Kodak Team to work on Sound Output by providing an option for higher watt Speakers.
Best Android TV at this cost. Best sound , Best Picture quality. Happy buyer.

Awesome clarity and sound.. Best value for money TV... It has almost all the apps inbuilt and the 4k videos are worth watching.. Best tv in the market for this price...
The demo and installation was done before the expected date.

It's perfect for the price paid. Good picture quality, the blacks aren't deep and needs some adjustment before you hit the sweet spot. I only use internet based apps so the picture resolution is good. Another great thing is the presence of 3.5 mm jack or the Aux port or the headphones jack to which I connect my old Sony speakers so sound quality is no more an issue. The newer models these days do not come with this aux-in port since the sound bars and all connect via hdmi or arc or optical port. So if you have an old set of speakers which only connect via the headphones jack, make sure your TV has that. Coming to build quality, it's pretty flimsy and have to be real careful with it, basically u're getting what you paid for.
I wanted a TV which will hold good for atleast 2 years so let's see how far this one goes. Overall I'd say I'm pretty satisfied with this purchase. Thanks to Flipkart and Kodak.

This LED Tv is Awesome.The only trouble i faced in the the installation process with the installation guy.He was very rude and not installed my TV properly i complaint on flipkart as well but didn't receive any proper response.The picture quality is Amazing ...sound quality needs to improve but it sufficient..overall an excellent package in this price range.I am totally satisfied with the product

this is the second time i am purchsing KODAK tv prior was 55ca series , which is super fine and working wonderfully , and this ismy second purchase , i absolutely have no problem with kodak , i see the price is very less than other brands and quality is super good , i am a happy customer choosing KODAK

Tv has great colors, sound, clarity, etc. Everything is fine however there are minor enhancements required for this TV to be the best in its class.
1. It should support Netflix out of the box. Right now it is not supported, upon talking to helpline they said to use netflix mobile version APK to be installed in TV using pendrive.
2. It doesn't support any well known browser which you can use to browse netflix web, history web, etc.
You can't download chrome, firefox, microsoft edge or netflix even from playstore as they are not supported in this TV.

Note: you can use puffin TV browser for browsing however you still can't run History or Netflix, etc on it.

The Product is Excellent ...
*No 43" 4K TV is available in this range
*As my set top box is sd there is slight distribution of pixels and not all channels in same visibility but better the Old tv

* Loved the remote very impressive and easy to use.
* I got an Extra discount using SBI Credit Card
* People who want a budget 4k TV below 25 K , I prefer this
* One disadvantage is the stands used to install on table are plastic so should be careful while handling.
